author: mrodozov
body:
#### PR description:
Change long with int:
https://docs.python.org/3/whatsnew/3.0.html#integers
first answer on SO about that 
Not sure if int is acceptable the way we are running now. 
If not I can put version check condition

#### PR validation:
Runs with both py2 and 3
title: Py2to3: change long to int as long is not available in py3
